name: Crypto Fantasy Coin
description: Crypto Fantasy = CF is a “Play to Earn” model where anyone can participate and earn rewards through Games / NFT / Defi. Players collect heroes, spawn monsters, and aim to become the top player. teethIt is a mechanism that you can earn rewards by playing the game. It is the ecosystem that can provide more rewards by increasing the number of players and circulating the system. In addition to the normal NFTs (BEP, ERC standard), you can also use your own original NFTs in the game, such as real people, popular anime characters, and expensive physical assets.
